CustomField.description: This setting is used by Apex to determine if we send a case list the JCFS API (recommended). Created 03/22/2025 TCE
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to use the Advanced API. This is the default setting. The Basic API does not send a case list to the JCFS.API tooling. If you are having trouble with API calls, try to disable this setting.
CustomField.label: JCFS API Use Advanced API
